# isAnimating

**Instance Property**

Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the animation is running.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isAnimating: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the animation is running; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Animating a sequence of images

- **animationImages**: An array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage] objects to use for an animation.
- **highlightedAnimationImages**: An array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage] objects to use for an animation when the view is highlighted.
- **animationDuration**: The amount of time it takes to go through one cycle of the images.
- **animationRepeatCount**: Specifies the number of times to repeat the animation.
- **startAnimating()**: Starts animating the images in the receiver.
- **stopAnimating()**: Stops animating the images in the receiver.
